name: All Round Hunter
overview: For the first time ever on the Wii console, experience all the excitement of all three different disiplines of hunting: fish from the lakes; game on the land; birds from the sky. Only those who have mastered all three skills can claim to be the All Round Hunter. Hunt more than 30 big game, native and fowl species across multiple environments rich with wildlife activity in varying weather conditions and day/night hunting cycles. - Use your skills to find over 20 different species in the air and on land in their natural habitats - 5 different environments (Tarn, Lake, Valley, Mountain River and Woodland) - Embark on your own single-player adventure or challenge a friend in multiplayer.
